description:
Securing sleeping pads to your backpack, strapping multiple dry bags together, or compressing your stuff, these straps are good for pretty much anything.

  • Polypropylene webbing is resistant to UV damage
  • Quick hook aluminum buckle allows easy tensioning and release
  • Lashing capacity: 100kg (220lb)
  • Includes 2 straps
name: Sea To Summit Hook Released 20mm Accessory Straps - 2 Pack
